General.Name: Zhejiang Vie Science & Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang VIE Science & Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of automobile chassis control systems in China and internationally. It provides passenger car and commercial vehicle chassis control systems, including chassis front and rear suspension systems, automotive electronic control systems, air pressure braking systems, hydraulic braking systems, clutch control systems, and chassis sub-frames; and pneumatic disc brakes, pneumatic ABS, EBS, AEBS, ESC, EPB, ECAS, XEPS, hydraulic disc brakes, hydraulic EPB/EPBi, EHB, electric vacuum pumps, aluminum alloy chassis modules, aluminum alloy fixed calipers, etc. The company also offers agricultural machinery parts. It primarily serves large and medium-sized OEMs. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Zhuji, China.
General.Address: VIE Science & Technology Zone, Zhuji, China, 311835
